name: csshake
description: Some CSS classes to move your DOM!

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run gzip && npm run gzip:all
scripts.build: npm run build:raw && npm run build:min
scripts.build:min: mkdir -p dist/min && node-sass --output-style compressed scss/ -o dist/min && npm run suffix && npm run move
scripts.suffix: for file in dist/min/*.css; do mv "$file" "${file%.css}.min.css"; done
scripts.gzip:all: for file in dist/*.css; do echo "$file"; gzip-size "$file" | pretty-bytes; done
